name: Tap Tap Beer - Tavern Edition
description:
Where do warriors, wizards, elves, orcs and general fantasy folk spend most of their time? Well, the tavern, of course!



Open your own tavern, serve all sorts of mighty heroes (and the occasional evil lords) and be fast to keep the beer flowing and the gold pouring at magical speeds!

Unlock new and fantastic lands to expand your beer empire opening new taverns to take quality ale to all corners of the world!

Featuring:

  • 40+ levels and hundreds of customers;
  • Full controller support;
  • Play in 5 different worlds;
  • Originally composed soundtracks;
